description: This is a test file for the KeyValueType and TextKeyValueType classes, containing unit tests implemented with Google Test framework.

classes.name: KeyValueType
classes.description: A template class for key-value pairs with comparison and accessor methods.

classes.name: TextKeyValueType
classes.description: A template class handling key-value pairs with text fragments, case sensitivity option.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: Represents a fragment of text, used as keys and values in text-based key-value pairs.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class that encapsulates optional values, similar to std::optional.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string,string>
methods.description: Constructor that initializes with key, key-value constructor, copy constructor, assignment operator.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string,string>.IsKey
methods.description: Checks if the given string matches the key.

methods.name: TextKeyValueType<CASESENSITIVE, TextFragment>
methods.description: Constructor and parameterized constructor taking key and value.
